title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat folders, code highlighting, model manager, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal; written in Go.

title: Ollama-GUI (open-webui)
summary: Community fork of the original Ollama WebUI adding plugins, RAG, and user roles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit; drop in your docs and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, list, pull, delete models; Android compatible.

title: ollama-chatbot (discord)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-crystal
summary: Crystal-lang wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with built-in model registry types.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; tokio & hyper under the hood.

title: ollama-npm (community)
summary: Community-published NPM wrapper around the Ollama REST API with extra helpers for Next.js.

title: ollama-pypi (extra)
summary: PyPI package adding Pydantic models, retry logic, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints for Ollama.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread on Ollama’s v0.1.35 release featuring concurrent model loading.

title: Ollama integrations list (awesome-ollama)
summary: Curated list of tools, SDKs, GUIs, Helm charts, and tutorials for the Ollama ecosystem.
